mapper.insert: insert into tbl_menu(menucode, masterno,fk_masterno, fk_menuspeccode, menuname, menuprice, menucomment, fileName, orgFilename, fileSize, fk_shopcategory, pop_menuspeccode) values(SEQ_TBL_MENU_MENUCODE.nextval, #{masterno}, #{masterno}, #{fk_menuspeccode}, #{menuname}, #{menuprice}, #{menucomment}, #{fileName}, #{orgFilename}, #{fileSize}, #{fk_shopcategorycode}, #{pop_menuspeccode})
